03.03.2004 SH SCR5564 Changed and added new parameters, relevant for BXA900
, also changed the argument list for BXA900

- contain a value <> 0
26.03.2003 SH SCR3226 Delete Stored REAP row and all temp. XML files, if no
- debtor clients were selected and removed range for debc selection
- DEBB_ACTINVAH <> 0 (only if PI.ONLYBALANCE = true) from CTRL+H in task
- "details_debtor_client" and implemented instead of CTRL+H a block in the R.S.
- because the selection didn't worked correctly until 19.02.2003

in the night program

- AS400 to turn job to message wait

debtor currency, before it was 0.
